statements: SELECT * FROM ExperimentData
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM ExperimentData WHERE experiment_id = 1
SELECT experiment_name, data_point FROM ExperimentData WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM ExperimentData WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT experiment_name, data_point FROM ExperimentData ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, data_point, experiment_date FROM ExperimentData WHERE data_point > 10 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, AVG(data_point) as avg_data_point FROM ExperimentData GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING AVG(data_point) > 20
SELECT * FROM ExperimentData WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%experiment%'
SELECT experiment_id, researcher_name FROM ExperimentData WHERE researcher_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT MAX(data_point) as max_data_point, MIN(data_point) as min_data_point FROM ExperimentData
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT result_value, result_timestamp FROM results ORDER BY result_timestamp DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM results WHERE result_value > 50 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, result_value, result_timestamp FROM results WHERE result_value > 50.0 ORDER BY result_timestamp;
SELECT experiments.experiment_name, results.result_value FROM experiments JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_type FROM experiment_data;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM experiment_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM experiment_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_type = 'Chemistry' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;

SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(result_id) AS result_count FROM experiment_data LEFT JOIN experimental_results ON experiment_data.experiment_id = experimental_results.experiment_id GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING result_count > 5;
SELECT experiment_id, MAX(result_timestamp) AS latest_result_timestamp FROM experimental_results GROUP BY experiment_id;
SELECT experiment_id, AVG(log_id) AS avg_log_id FROM experiment_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY experiment_id ORDER BY avg_log_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT subject_name, subject_age FROM subjects;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_date FROM measurements;
SELECT parameter_name FROM parameters;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT subject_name, subject_age FROM subjects WHERE subject_age > 30;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_value, measurement_date FROM measurements WHERE measurement_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM subjects JOIN measurements ON subjects.subject_id = measurements.subject_id;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'DNA';
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_unit FROM measurements WHERE sample_id = 2 AND measurement_value > 10;
